pages.title: Purgen gun
pages.text: If the patient doesn't want do take the curative, the doctor is permit to use additional instruments...$(br)Purgen gun accelerates pilule directly into the patient's mouth. Of course, works with bundle.

pages.text: If you want to protect yourself from being 'cured' - you can use hazmat suit (link to poop basics hazmat entry).$(br)Also there is a small chance of a misfire - pilule will fly directly into shooter's mouth :3
